architecture_notes: This database serves as the foundation for PyTorch chord progression generation
Each emotion maps to a specific musical mode with 12 genre-weighted progressions
Progressions are used for both training data and real-time lookup/blending
Genre weights enable probabilistic selection and style-aware generation
Future: Can be extended with MIDI data, voice leading rules, and rhythm patterns

Joy.description: Bright, balanced, uplifting; evokes happiness and warmth.

Sadness.description: Soft despair, introspective loss, emotional gravity.

Fear.description: Claustrophobic tension, inner dread, survival mode.

Trust.description: Grounded and warm; minor with a ray of hope.

Love.description: Nostalgic, soulful warmth with relaxed tension.
